Description:

This includes developing financial models, forecasting future revenues and expenses, and identifying potential risks and opportunities. The Financial Analyst will also work with other departments to ensure that the company is meeting its financial goals.Job Responsibilities :Analyze financial data to identify trends, risks, and opportunities.
Prepare financial reports, including budgets, forecasts, and financial statements.
Make recommendations to senior management on financial matters.
Develop and maintain financial models.
Conduct financial research.
Prepare financial reports and presentations.
Analyzing the financial impact of new products or services
Developing and implementing financial risk management strategies
Overseeing the company's treasury operations
Stay up to date on financial regulations and trends.
Collaborate with other departments to ensure the financial health of the company.Skills
